name: bombom.io
description:
BomBom.io is an action .io game in which you control aircraft with other players on the server. Your goal will be to drop bombs while flying and try to destroy the whole city. The more you try to destroy, the more points you get. This puts you in a higher position in the table and also easily destroys weaker enemies, for which you can earn additional points and increase your chances of winning. If you enjoy similar online games in which you have to destroy the surroundings, so you will certainly have fun. In addition, the game offers nice 3D graphics and easy operation.

controls: mouse or arrows or wasd
